message.subject: Asset Created
message.body: New %type_code% "%asset_name%" created

message.subject: Asset Status Changed
message.body: The status of "%asset_name%" was successfully changed from "%old_status%" to "%new_status%"

message.subject: Asset Date Changed
message.body: The %date_type% date of "%asset_name%" was successfully changed from "%old_date%" to "%new_date%"

message.subject: Asset Attribute Changed
message.body: The value of attribute "%attr_name%" for asset "%asset_name%" has been changed

message.subject: Asset Attribute Changed
message.body: The value of attribute "%attr_name%" for asset "%asset_name%" has been changed from "%old_value%" to "%new_value%"

message.subject: Asset Attribute Changed
message.body: The value of attribute "%attr_name%" for asset "%asset_name%" has been changed

message.subject: Asset Attribute Changed
message.body: The value of attribute "%attr_name%" for asset "%asset_name%" has been changed from "%old_value%" to "%new_value%"

message.subject: Asset Lock Forcibly Acquired
message.body: User "%user_name%" has forcibly acquired the %lock_type% lock on %type_code% "%asset_name%", formerly held by user "%old_user_name%"

message.subject: Asset Link Created
message.body: "%minor_name%" was successfully linked to "%major_name%"

message.subject: Asset Link Type Updated
message.body: The type of link #%linkid% (between "%major_name%" and "%minor_name%") was successfully changed from %old_link_type% to %new_link_type%

message.subject: Asset Link Value Updated
message.body: 'The value on link #%linkid% (between "%major_name%" and "%minor_name%") was successfully changed from %old_link_value% to %new_link_value%

message.subject: Asset Link Sort Order Updated
message.body: The sort order of link #%linkid% (between "%major_name%" and "%minor_name%") was successfully changed from %old_sort_order% to %new_sort_order%

message.subject: Asset Link Deleted
message.body: "%minor_name%" was successfully unlinked from "%major_name%"

message.subject: Asset Lookups Updated
message.body: Asset "%asset_name%" has successfully updated its lookups

message.subject: Asset Permission Set
message.body: %perm_name% permission has been granted on asset "%asset_name%" for "%user_name%"

message.subject: Asset Permission Set
message.body: %perm_name% permission has been denied on asset "%asset_name%" for "%user_name%"

message.subject: Asset Permission Deleted
message.body: %perm_name% permission has been deleted on asset "%asset_name%" for "%user_name%"

message.subject: HIPO Herder
message.body: FORCE KILL %hipo_code_name%

message.subject: HIPO Herder
message.body: ORPHAN KILL %hipo_code_name%

message.subject: User Account Locked
message.body: User "%user_name%" has had their account locked after %num_attempts% unsuccessful login attempts

message.subject: User Logged In
message.body: User "%user_name%" logged in

message.subject: User Logged Out
message.body: User "%user_name%" logged themselves out

message.subject: User Login Failed
message.body: User "%login_name%" failed to login (%failure_reason%)

message.subject: User Automatically Logged Out
message.body: User "%user_name%" was logged out since they were inactive for %timeout% seconds

message.subject: User Automatically Logged Out
message.body: User "%user_name%" was logged out since they hadn't authenticated for %timeout% seconds

message.subject: Security Alert
message.body: Possible attempt to steal session detected!

message.subject: Install
message.body: UNINSTALLED the following asset types as they are no longer recognised by any package: %type_code_list%

message.body: %auth_type_name% Authentication Type Created : %assetid%

message.subject: POTENTIAL CRON MANAGER DEAD LOCK ISSUE
message.body:
The cron manager for the system "%system_name%" has attempted to run %num_attempts% times, but has not been able to for one of two reasons: 1) An existing cron manager is currently running an extremely long running job. 2) Something has caused the cron manager to exit uncleanly and the lock wasn't able to be removed.
Check the cron error log (in %error_log_path%) for any information.
(System Root Urls : %root_urls%)

message.subject: FORCED FAILURE of %cron_type_code%
message.body: The job "%cron_job_name%" (#%assetid%) has failed to run %num_attempts% times. It will be removed from the cron manager and will NOT be run again.

message.subject: TERMINATION of Cron Manager
message.body:
The cron manager for the system "%system_name%" fatally triggered an error, terminating the cron manager's run. Check the cron error log (in "%error_log_path%") for any information.
(System Root Urls : %root_urls%)

message.subject: %cron_type_code% Success
message.body:
%cron_job_name% Scheduled : %cron_job_when% Completed Successfully
%exec_msg%
Error Messages : %errors%

message.subject: %cron_type_code% Failure
message.body:
%cron_job_name% Scheduled : %cron_job_when% Failed
%exec_msg%
Error Messages : %errors%

message.subject: %cron_type_code% Success
message.body:
%cron_job_name% Scheduled : %cron_job_when% Successful, but there is more work to do
%exec_msg%
Error Messages : %errors%

message.subject: %cron_type_code% ERROR
message.body:
%cron_job_name% Scheduled : %cron_job_when% ################################################################### # RETURNED AN INVALID RESULT FROM _exec() # Returned Value : %result% # (Translated : %result_bits%) ###################################################################
%exec_msg%
Error Messages : %errors%

message.subject: TERMINATION of %cron_type_code%
message.body:
The job "%asset_name%" (#%assetid%) fatally triggered an error and terminated the cron script. It has been removed from the cron manager.
Error Messages : %errors%

message.subject: Another instance of %cron_type_code% is still running
message.body: The job "%asset_name%" (#%assetid%) is still running while another instance tries to start at %run_time%. Please increase the time interval between each run.

message.subject: Trigger Execution Success
message.body: SUCCESS Trigger "%trigger_name%" (#%triggerid%), Event: "%event%" broadcast by Asset: "%asset_name%" (#%assetid%)

message.subject: Trigger Execution FAILURE
message.body: INVALID (Trigger components could not be loaded) Trigger "%trigger_name%" (#%triggerid%), Event: "%event%" broadcast by Asset: "%asset_name%" (#%assetid%)

message.subject: Asset Made Live
message.body: %type_code% "%asset_name%" has gone live from "%status%". You can view the asset here.

message.subject: Workflow Approval Required
message.body:
%type_code% "%asset_name%" is currently in workflow. You are now required to approve or reject the changes made to "%asset_name%" so the workflow process can continue.
A full report for the Workflow of "%asset_name%" can be found on the <SQ_MSG_LINK href="%workflow_url%">Workflow Screen</SQ_MSG_LINK> You can also <SQ_MSG_LINK href="%preview_url%">preview this asset.</SQ_MSG_LINK>

message.subject: Workflow Approval Required
message.body:
%type_code% "%asset_name%" is currently in workflow and has progressed from step %previous_step_id% "%previous_step_name%" to step %current_step_id% "%current_step_name%". You are now required to approve or reject the changes made to "%asset_name%" so the workflow process can continue.
A full report for the Workflow of "%asset_name%" can be found on the <SQ_MSG_LINK href="%workflow_url%">Workflow Screen</SQ_MSG_LINK>. You can also <SQ_MSG_LINK href="%preview_url%">preview this asset.</SQ_MSG_LINK>

message.subject: Asset Safe Edit Cancelled
message.body: User "%user_name%" has cancelled the safe edit of %type_code% "%asset_name%". "%asset_name%" has reverted to the previously saved version and the status of "%asset_name%" is now %status%

message.subject: Asset Review Cancelled
message.body:
User "%user_name%" has started a safe edit of %type_code% "%asset_name%" during a review. The review has been cancelled and the status of "%asset_name%" is now %status%.
A full report for the Workflow of "%asset_name%" can be found on the <SQ_MSG_LINK href="%workflow_url%">Workflow Screen</SQ_MSG_LINK>. You can also <SQ_MSG_LINK href="%preview_url%">preview this asset.</SQ_MSG_LINK>

message.subject: Asset Review Cancelled
message.body:
User "%user_name%" has started a safe edit of %type_code% "%asset_name%" during a review. The review has been cancelled and the status of "%asset_name%" is now %status%.
A full report for the Workflow of "%asset_name%" can be found on the <SQ_MSG_LINK href="%workflow_url%">Workflow Screen</SQ_MSG_LINK>. You can also <SQ_MSG_LINK href="%preview_url%">preview this asset.</SQ_MSG_LINK>

message.subject: Review Complete
message.body:
The review process for %type_code% "%asset_name%" has been completed. "%asset_name%" is now live.
A full report for the Workflow of "%asset_name%" can be found on the <SQ_MSG_LINK href="%workflow_url%">Workflow Screen</SQ_MSG_LINK>. You can also <SQ_MSG_LINK href="%preview_url%">preview this asset.</SQ_MSG_LINK>

message.subject: Workflow Started
message.body:
User "%user_name%" has requested %type_code% "%asset_name%" to go live from %status%.
A full report for the Workflow of "%asset_name%" can be found on the <SQ_MSG_LINK href="%workflow_url%">Workflow Screen</SQ_MSG_LINK>. You can also <SQ_MSG_LINK href="%preview_url%">preview this asset.</SQ_MSG_LINK>

message.subject: Asset Changes Approved
message.body:
User "%user_name%" has approved the changes to %type_code% "%asset_name%".
A full report for the Workflow of "%asset_name%" can be found on the <SQ_MSG_LINK href="%workflow_url%">Workflow Screen</SQ_MSG_LINK>

message.subject: Asset Changes Approved
message.body:
User "%user_name%" has approved the changes to %type_code% "%asset_name%".
A full report for the Workflow of "%asset_name%" can be found on the <SQ_MSG_LINK href="%workflow_url%">Workflow Screen</SQ_MSG_LINK>

message.subject: Asset Up For Review
message.body:
User "%user_name%" has placed %type_code% "%asset_name%" up for review. You are now required to approve or reject the changes made to "%asset_name%" so the workflow process can continue.
<SQ_MSG_LINK href="%workflow_url%">Click here for the Workflow Screen for this asset</SQ_MSG_LINK>. You can also <SQ_MSG_LINK href="%preview_url%">preview this asset.</SQ_MSG_LINK>

message.subject: Asset Up For Review
message.body:
User "%user_name%" has placed %type_code% "%asset_name%" up for review.
<SQ_MSG_LINK href="%workflow_url%">Click here for the Workflow Screen for this asset</SQ_MSG_LINK>. You can also <SQ_MSG_LINK href="%preview_url%">preview this asset.</SQ_MSG_LINK>

message.subject: Asset Changes Rejected
Asset Changes Rejected
Workflow Completed
message.body:
The workflow process for %type_code% "%asset_name%" has been completed. "%asset_name%" is now approved and can be made live by an administrator.
A full report for the Workflow of "%asset_name%" can be found on the <SQ_MSG_LINK href="%workflow_url%">Workflow Screen</SQ_MSG_LINK>. You can also <SQ_MSG_LINK href="%preview_url%">preview this asset.</SQ_MSG_LINK>

message.subject: Workflow Completed
message.body:
The workflow process for %type_code% "%asset_name%" has been completed. "%asset_name%" is now approved and can be made live by an administrator.
A full report for the Workflow of "%asset_name%" can be found on the <SQ_MSG_LINK href="%workflow_url%">Workflow Screen</SQ_MSG_LINK>. You can also <SQ_MSG_LINK href="%preview_url%">preview this asset.</SQ_MSG_LINK>

message.subject: Workflow User Log
message.body: %message%

message.subject: Stale Workflow Step
message.body: Asset "%asset_name%" [#%assetid%] has been in step %step_id% "%step_name%" of workflow schema "%schema%" since %started_time%, and has exceeded the %expiry_time% timeframe within which this step is meant to be completed. You may want to consider intervening to progress this workflow by visiting the asset's <SQ_MSG_LINK href="%workflow_url%">workflow screen</SQ_MSG_LINK>.

message.subject: Workflow Escalated
message.body:
Asset "%asset_name%" [#%assetid%] was in step %previous_step_id% "%previous_step_name%" of workflow schema "%schema%" since %started_time%, and has exceeded the %expiry_time% timeframe within which this step is meant to be completed. Workflow has been escalated to step %current_step_id% "%current_step_name%".
A full report for the Workflow of "%asset_name%" can be found on the <SQ_MSG_LINK href="%workflow_url%">Workflow Screen</SQ_MSG_LINK>.

message.subject: Workflow Escalated
message.body:
Asset "%asset_name%" [#%assetid%] was in step %previous_step_id% "%previous_step_name%" of workflow schema "%schema%" since %started_time%, and has exceeded the %expiry_time% timeframe within which this step is meant to be completed. Workflow has been escalated to step %current_step_id% "%current_step_name%".
A full report for the Workflow of "%asset_name%" can be found on the <SQ_MSG_LINK href="%workflow_url%">Workflow Screen</SQ_MSG_LINK>.

message.subject: Safe Trash Warning: %asset_name%
message.body:
You have administrator access to the asset "%link_asset_name%" (Id: #%link_assetid%), which is a child of asset "%asset_name%" (Id: #%assetid%). The parent asset was marked to be safe-trashed by "%trashing_user%", and has been marked since %trash_date%.
"%asset_name%" cannot be trashed until all of its children also meet safe-trash conditions. Your asset is currently blocking this safe-trashing. This could be for one of two reasons. Your asset could be at a status of "Live" or higher. Or, your asset could contain links to other assets that are hidden to the asset map.
Please rectify the above issues so the asset can be trashed as soon as possible, or consult the user who marked the asset for safe trashing.

message.subject: Safe Trash Warning: %asset_name%
message.body:
You have administrator access to the asset "%link_asset_name%" (Id: #%link_assetid%), which is linked to asset "%asset_name%" (Id: #%assetid%). The linked asset was marked to be safe-trashed by "%trashing_user%", and has been marked since %trash_date%.
Your asset currently contains links to "%asset_name%" that are hidden to the asset map (of type TYPE_3 or NOTICE - often this is due to links within bodycopies). "%asset_name%" cannot be trashed until all TYPE_3 or NOTICE links to it are removed.
Please rectify the above issue (by removing the links) so the asset can be trashed as soon as possible, or consult the user who marked the asset for safe trashing.

message.subject: Safe Trash Warning: %asset_name%
message.body:
You have administrator access to the asset "%asset_name%" (Id: #%assetid%), which was marked to be safe-trashed by "%trashing_user%". The asset has been marked since %trash_date%.
This asset is currently at a status of "%asset_status%". It cannot be trashed until the asset is "Placed Under Construction" or "Archived".
Please rectify the above issue (by changing the status of the asset) so it can be trashed as soon as possible, or consult the user who marked the asset for safe trashing.
